name: aithentic-assignment-processor
description: Fetch PDF assignments from AWS S3, download them locally, and convert to plain text files.

scripts.postinstall: echo '⚠️  IMPORTANT: Before running this script, install system dependency: poppler-utils. See README.md for instructions.'

author: Aithentic

systemDependencies.poppler-utils: Required for pdftotext fallback converter. Install: sudo apt-get install poppler-utils (Ubuntu/Debian) or brew install poppler (macOS)
